location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Owen Tudor Burne, India Office to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter, written on thick black edged mourning paper, regarding his brother Captain George William Burne who is a candidate for a vacancy as an elder brother in the Trinity House, and asking whether Richard William Pelly, who is already an elder brother there, is a relative of his and if so whether he could ask him to support his candidacy.
